comments:
if you select one of the top level folders in DTD outline (Elements, Entities,
Notations, Other) when the "Group items logically" button is depressed on the
toolbar,

you get this ClassCastException.

StructuredTextViewer assumes that selection will always be an IndexedRegion. 
Earlier revisions of the DTD outline used to ensure this even in logical
grouping mode, but that code was removed and the corresponding changes to
StructuredTextViewer were never made.
StructuredTextViewer updated so that non-IndexedNodes return nothingToSelect=true.
